mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM D_WORK WHERE to_char(DW_DAY,'YYYYMMDD')= to_char(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}),'YYYYMMDD')) AS ZERO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM D_WORK WHERE DW_STATUS = '1' and to_char(DW_DAY,'YYYYMMDD')= to_char(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}),'YYYYMMDD')) AS ONE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM D_WORK WHERE DW_STATUS = '2' and to_char(DW_DAY,'YYYYMMDD')= to_char(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}),'YYYYMMDD')) AS TWO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM D_WORK WHERE DW_STATUS = '3' and to_char(DW_DAY,'YYYYMMDD')= to_char(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}),'YYYYMMDD')) AS THREE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM D_WORK WHERE DW_STATUS = '4' and to_char(DW_DAY,'YYYYMMDD')= to_char(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}),'YYYYMMDD')) AS FOUR FROM d_work WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(DW_DAY,'YYYYMMDD')=TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}),'YYYYMMDD') AND ROWNUM = 1

select count(*) from member a inner join ( select a.m_id, a.dw_status, a.dw_day, a.dw_time, a.dw_notice, b.p_name, b.p_addr from d_work a inner join place b on a.p_name = b.p_name WHERE 1=1 AND to_char(a.DW_DAY,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}),'YYYYMMDD') AND a.dw_status = #{dw_status} ) c on a.m_id = c.m_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.d_code = #{d_code} AND a.m_name = #{m_name}
SELECT * FROM D_WORK a, member b WHERE 1=1 and a.m_id = b.m_id AND a.m_id = #{m_id} AND to_char(a.DW_DAY,'YYYYMMDD') between TO_CHAR(sysdate-30,'YYYYMMDD') and TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT RN, H.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, F.m_id, F.m_name, F.d_code, G.d_name, F.m_position, F.m_gubun, F.m_joindate, F.m_leavedate, F.m_notice, F.dw_status, F.dw_day, F.dw_time, F.dw_notice, F.p_name, F.p_addr FROM DEPT G INNER JOIN ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.m_id, a.m_name, a.d_code, a.m_position, a.m_gubun, a.m_joindate, a.m_leavedate, a.m_notice, E.dw_status, E.dw_day, E.dw_time, E.dw_notice, E.p_name, E.p_addr from member A inner join( SELECT ROWNUM rn, C.m_id, C.dw_status, C.dw_day, C.dw_time, C.dw_notice, D.p_name, D.p_addr from d_work C INNER JOIN PLACE D ON C.p_name = D.p_name WHERE 1=1 AND to_char(C.DW_DAY,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{searchDate}),'YYYYMMDD') AND C.dw_status = #{dw_status} ) E ON E.M_ID = A.M_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.d_code = #{d_code} AND a.m_name = #{m_name} ORDER BY CASE WHEN A.m_position = '상무' THEN 1 WHEN A.m_position = '부장' THEN 2 WHEN A.m_position = '차장' THEN 3 WHEN A.m_position = '과장' THEN 4 WHEN A.m_position = '대리' THEN 5 WHEN A.m_position = '사원' THEN 6 ELSE 30 END ) F ON F.D_CODE = G.D_CODE ) H WHERE rn between #{start} and #{end}
